data.name: Dominay
data.detailed_description:
The new PvPvE. Win the match by completing missions or fighting the enemy team in the forest.
Welcome to Dominay, a game of adventure, action, and strategy like you've never played before.

advantage

In each game you can choose your advantage. Each has a unique power that determines what type of player you will be.

Weapons

Weapons are your most important skills, you can find them in chests. Each weapon has a different style for you, you're sure to have your favorite.

items

It's important that you know the Dominay Forest well, because the more you explore the map, the more items you'll find that will help you in the battles that await you in the forest.

objectives

To win the game in Dominay, you'll be able to complete missions against the opposing team around the map. For each of these tasks, your team will receive a score. After 10 minutes, the winner is the one who has the most points.

data.short_description: The new PvPvE. Win the match by completing missions or fighting the enemy team in the forest. Welcome to Dominay, a game of adventure, action, and strategy like you've never played before. Choose your Advantage, find your weapons and items, and fulfill quests in the forest. PLAY FOR FREE
data.supported_languages:
Portuguese - Brazil*, English*, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win 7,8,9
  • Processor: Intel: Core i3-530 ou AMD: A6-3650
  • Graphics: NVidia: GeForce 9600GT ou AMD: HD 6570
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel: Core i5-3300 ou AMD: Ryzen 3 1200
  • Graphics: NVidia: GeForce 560 ou AMD: Radeon HD 6950
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
